mapper.select: SELECT MID, BNAME, MEMBERCOUNT, EDIT_NAME, MY.BID FROM BAND B JOIN (SELECT COUNT(MB.MID) AS MEMBERCOUNT, MB.BID FROM MEMBER_BAND MB GROUP BY MB.BID ORDER BY MB.BID ASC) C ON (C.BID = B.BID) JOIN (SELECT M.MID, MB.BID, P.EDIT_NAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN MEMBER_BAND MB ON (M.MID = MB.MID) JOIN PROFILE P ON (MB.BID = P.BID) WHERE M.MID = #{mid}) MY ON (MY.BID = B.BID) WHERE BSTATUS = 'Y'

SELECT R.NO, R.REF_COUNT, B.BID, D.BNAME, B.MID, M.MNAME, A.EDIT_NAME, A.FLEVEL, B.BCONTENT FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS NO, C.REF_COUNT, C.REF_BID FROM( SELECT COUNT(BCONTENT) AS REF_COUNT, REF_BID FROM BOARDS WHERE REF_STATUS = 'COMMENT' AND BSTATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY REF_BID ORDER BY REF_COUNT DESC) C WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5) R JOIN BOARDS B ON (R.REF_BID = B.BOARDID) JOIN BAND D ON (B.BID = D.BID) JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.MID = M.MID) JOIN ATTFILE A ON (A.BOARDID = B.BOARDID)

SELECT B.BNAME, C.CNAME, P.EDIT_NAME, B.BINTRO FROM BAND B JOIN PROFILE P ON (P.BID = B.BID) JOIN CATEGORY C ON (B.CID = C.CID) WHERE BSTATUS = 'Y' and b.bid NOT IN (select bid from member_band WHERE MID = #{mid})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BAND VALUES(SEQ_BID.NEXTVAL, #{bname}, #{bopen_status}, null, 999, null, 'Y')
INSERT INTO PROFILE VALUES(SEQ_PID.NEXTVAL, #{originName}, #{editName}, #{fileSrc}, SYSDATE, 2, NULL, #{bid})
